hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas (Allah be pleased with them) reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:A woman who has been previously married (Thayyib) has more right to her person than her guardian. And a virgin should also be consulted, and her silence implies her consent

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِئْذَانِ الثَّيِّبِ فِي النِّكَاحِ بِالنُّطْقِ وَالْبِكْرِ بِالسُّكُوتِ
chapter.eng-name: Seeking permission of a previously-married woman in words, and of a virgin by silence
